strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemOne: Can facilitate all aspects of facility management with a mix of buildings (if available), tents and local equipment.
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemTwo: Can help locate suitable buildings (empty building, housing complex or a hotel that can be rented) for accommodation or offices and transition it into a field hotel, office area or operation center.
strings.designedForDetailsSectionTwo: Disasters where infrastructure has not been seriously damaged.
strings.standardComponentsDetails: Modules can be taken from the Base Camp modules or purchased locally.
